sentences.sContent: We can only prosecute if there is sufficient evidence.
sentences.sCn: 有了足够的证据，我们才能提出起诉。

sentences.sContent: Unauthorized absence is sufficient reason for dismissal.
sentences.sCn: 旷工足以成为解雇的理由。

sentences.sContent: We need sufficient time to deal with the problem.
sentences.sCn: 我们需要足够的时间来处理这个问题。

sentences.sContent: ...powerful forces are ideologically opposed to the whole idea of government action on a sufficient scale to jump-start the economy...
...American scientists complain about lack of sufficient money and equipment for their expansion in Antarctica...
...With sufficient will in Downing Street this would have been done already...
...she explained that the sufficient number of security guards would be working at peak hours to speed things along...
...Whether all that attention has translated into sufficient action is another question...

phrases.pCn: 不靠他人，不受他人影响
充要条件；必要且充分的条件
充要条件；充分必要条件
自给自足的；极为自负的

trans.tranOther: as much as is needed for a particular purpose
